QuestData.Title: The Brashtide Crew
QuestData.Description: The charts mention a group called the Brashtide Crew. This name is new to you, though you've heard about a few other newcomers to the Buccaneers.$b$bMaybe it's time you paid them a visit and found out what they know.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Long John Copper on the Damsel's Luck, Enormous Shawn Stooker on the Crimson Veil, and Wailing Mary Smitts on the Riptide.
QuestData.CompletionText: The details here are sparse. You'll need to find some other members of the Brashtide Crew if you want information.
QuestData.RewardText: The Brashtide Crew aren't just pirates... they're worgen pirates! And they're joining in on the attack!$b$bRevilgaz is definitely going to want to know about this.
